item.title: ðŸ”´ 00:23 Air anxiety in the Lviv region follow the following messages.
item.description: ðŸ”´ 00:23 Air anxiety in the Lviv region follow the following messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
